entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening then changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
